metadata.title: Curious Designs Bone Pendants, Two Pieces - Antiqued Goddesses, 2.75 Inches, Coloration Varies
features: Shade of antiquing will vary slightly, probably lighter. Two Pieces. Approx 2.75 inches.
Many more bone pendants to choose from. White goddesses available also.
Please see our apparel, jewelry, mosaic ceramic and bead lines!
Check out our Indonesian bone bead and recycled glass assortments.
Recycled water buffalo bone. 2.75 inches long.
description: Two Pieces! Nicely detailed, delicate antiqued goddess bone pendants. The brown antiquing will vary from the photo. Hand carved in Indonesia. Hole goes horizontally through the hands and is large enough for most cotton, hemp or leather cording. Approx 2.75 inches long. Carving may vary slightly from photo. Deceased Water Buffalo bone.
